amendment.description: Amendment improves college and career readiness for homeless youth by requiring States to include in the State Plan a description of how such youth would receive assistance from counselors to advise, prepare, and improve college readiness.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 34 printed in part B of House Report 114-29 to improve college and career readiness for homeless youth by requiring the State to include in the State Plan a description of how such youth would receive assistance from counselors to advise, prepare, and improve college readiness.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Castro (TX) amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Castro (TX) amendment (A034) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A034) offered by Mr. Castro (TX).
